text:
- Pi Securities is a
leading brokerage company
based in Thailand.

Our vision is to simplify
your investment journey.

In line with our digital
transformation strategy,

we aim to develop customer
engagement solution

powered by AI and
real-time data analytics.

- Firstly, we migrated from
an on-premises infrastructure
to the AWS Cloud.
The shift enables centralized data access,

address data privacy, and
restriction challenges.
Secondly, with Amazon QuickSight,

we developed an in-house
business intelligence tool,

as well as the customer
relationship management tool.
- I have seen how power on QuickSight is
in transforming our data handling,
serving as a cornerstone for smarter
and quicker business decisions.

This efficiency is crucial for
our individual stakeholders
and has proven particularly beneficial
for our investment consultants,

leading to improve customer
satisfaction and revenue growth.

- Amazon QuickSight enables
real-time monitoring
and detection of abnormalities,
allowing us to detect issue faster.

Amazon QuickSight facilitate
root cause analysis
and data visualization,
enabling faster troubleshooting
and resolution of incidents.

- By enhancing our data
analytics capabilities,

Pi Securities can
maintain our winning edge

in the highly competitive
financial services sector
in Thailand and the region.
